huji.ac.il.stick_defence

Class Server.Peer

  • java.lang.Object
    • huji.ac.il.stick_defence.Server.Peer
  • Enclosing class:
    Server

    public class Server.Peer
extends java.lang.Object
    A socket wrapper. Instead of keeping track on raw sockets, we wrap them as peers with name, id, and usfull methods.
